abstract: The blog network Sportsblogs has raised $7 million in a Series B round, The San Francisco Chronicle reported. The round was led by Comcast.
snippet: The blog network Sportsblogs has raised $7 million in a Series B round, The San Francisco Chronicle reported. The round was led by Comcast.
lead_paragraph: Blog network Sportsblogs has raised $7 million in a Series B round, The San Francisco Chronicle reported. The round was led by Comcast Corporation.

headline.main: Sportsblogs Inc. Scores $7 Million in 2nd Round
